% Stil für Überschriften
\titleformat{\section}{\color{jedsy}\Large\bfseries}{\thesection}{1em}{}
\titleformat{\subsection}{\color{jedsy}\large\bfseries}{\thesubsection}{1em}{}
\titleformat{\subsubsection}{\color{jedsy}\bfseries}{\thesubsubsection}{1em}{}

% Hyperref Setup

}

    \fontsize{20}{24}\selectfont\textbf{JEDSY}}%
}
